channel.title: Looping Bonus?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Looping Bonus?"

item.title: Re: Looping Bonus?
item.content:encoded: Well Tsuskee ball is unlocked at season 3. When you go up in season your tolerance for drinks increases, so you can handle more with less and eventually no downtime the next day. When cheating Billy will hurt your chances and the Rack will increase them.

item.title: Re: Looping Bonus?
item.content:encoded: It's old. There might be other bonuses not mentioned, but I can't think of anything off the top of my head.

item.title: Looping Bonus?
item.content:encoded:
After looping today, I went to the Party House and saw this line for Prize Wheel:

The manager takes you aside. "Hey, I saw your last Season - nice work. For a little 'incentive', we'll see if we can make this roll better."

Is it new or something old that nobody bothers to put in wiki?

Also, is there other bonus not mentioned in wiki after looping like this?
